reviewText: This is an easy to read book with great suggestions and questions for interview preparation

This is a well presented video that captivates high school students in a more interesting way.  Many important ideas are introduced in a somewhat funny but meaningful way to prepare individuals for interviewing. Helpful techniques and strategies are introduced to help get a job from proper attire to how to conduct oneself in an interview to be successful.

As a professional trainer, I'm always looking for video suppliments to my training sessions. I find the No Brainer series of videos well suited to a wide range of audiences. The humour, although corny seems to be enjoyed by young people and most of us older folks. It's light, has many excellent points and appears to be relevant for for 2001 job market, especially here in British Columbia. I would say the content is 98% relevant to what's expected here. Well worth the investment for me.
